snippet.title: Stage Fright Announcement Trailer (The Game Awards 2024)
snippet.description:
Hello Games are proud to be publishing the next game from Ghost Town Games.

From the makers of OVERCOOKED! comes an all new co-operative experience. Take your friend on an amazing adventure as you explore, solve escape rooms, overcome fiendish obstacles and unravel an ancient mystery.

Wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3260750/Stage_Fright/
